name: Angela Mastin
text: It is set up beautifully... The instructor Bill Rice.. Knows his stuff... He give hands on Training... And teaches Theory in terms that you comprehend... The office manager is also very well versed... I am looking forward to class on January4th

name: Vincent Estrada
text: I was welcomed with open arms here! Loved the students enthusiasm and instructors teaching methods. I recently moved to Decatur and needed a place I could trust to do my hair. Im glad I trusted them. I got tips and instructions on how to better care for my hair. Overall a fun, welcoming, and educational place. Thank you guys!!

name: Brent Harden
text: Janet is awesome! She does a great job on our 3 boys and 1 daughter. She always makes them look great. Our family loves her! Very sweet senorita!

name: Doris Martin
text: Friendly staff, They did a great job on my hair. I will be back.

name: cecelia reed
text: Amazing! Kaleigh gave me a trim today and did a perfect job. You would never know these are student. Professional and polite. Will be back weekly :)

name: Marquitta Williams
text: Love Getting My Hair Done At Charles Academy .Very Profession

name: Melissa Sistrunk
text: I went there yesterday and a student Haley did my hair she did a wonderful job took her time friendly and Sam the cashier was friendly as well and very helpful in every situation it seem thanks guys great job

name: Becky Pyron
text: I love their prices and I’ve never gotten a bad cut. If you don’t want them to cut too much off the length you do have to let them know not to pull the hair up and cut from the length underneath. The hair closest to the nap of your neck is shorter than what you see in a mirror - at least mine is.

name: Christy Lynn
text: Kyle Pipkin is awesome!! He did an amazing job on my hair and I didn’t get your basic cut he cut about 6 inches off and layered it.. he took his time and super friendly!! I’ve gotten so many compliments and I highly recommend everybody go see Kyle!! Thanks hun!!

name: Charybdis ¿?
text: My friend goes here and it's superb compared to Remington.. it's a dream school, at least you learn to actually cut hair and the basics were you don't at any other school.

name: Stephen Morgan
text: Amazing hair school!! I loved it and learned alot! :)

name: Tina Windham
text: Miss jordan gave me a fabulous haircut

name: Linda Campbell
text: It's cheaper than most shops that does 💇
